about.title: About me
about.paragraf1: I am a Full-Stack developer who enjoys technology, programming, and problem-solving. I stand out for my ability to learn autonomously, as well as my adaptability and teamwork skills. I like to take on challenges that allow me to improve my skills and acquire new knowledge.
about.paragraf2: In 2024, I graduated as a University Technician in Programming from the National Technological University. I have experience in both backend and frontend development.
about.paragraf3: I am looking for an opportunity to apply my knowledge in real projects, continue growing professionally, and contribute to a development team with commitment and responsibility.
about.invitation: You can download my Curriculum Vitae below for more information.

exp.description: I collaborate as a Full-Stack developer, working in a team with other developers on various projects. I adapt to the project's needs, taking on roles in both frontend and backend, using technologies such as React, C#, .NET, and MySQL. This experience has allowed me to strengthen my technical and teamwork skills in a collaborative environment.

I collaborate as a Full-Stack developer, working in a team with other developers on various projects. I adapt to the project's needs, taking on roles in both frontend and backend, using technologies such as React, C#, .NET, and MySQL. This experience has allowed me to strengthen my technical and teamwork skills in a collaborative environment.

tech.title: Technologies
tech.paragraf2: My focus is on adaptability to new technologies and teamwork, applying agile methodologies such as Scrum and Kanban.
tech.paragraf3: In Frontend, I have experience in creating small and medium-sized web applications using React, applying HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as developing some animations. I have also worked with WordPress, creating custom plugins and optimizing functionalities.
tech.paragraf4: In Backend, I work with C# using ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework, and MySQL, allowing me to develop REST APIs and efficiently manage databases.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Samuel Carranza
portfolio.subtitle: Landing page desarrollada en React para exhibir el trabajo profesional de un fotógrafo y editor de videos.
portfolio.description: Landing page visualmente atractiva desarrollada en React que destaca el trabajo profesional de Samuel como fotógrafo y editor de videos. El sitio presenta una galería dinámica de fotografías y videos, complementada con secciones sobre su trayectoria profesional y experiencia laboral. La página incluye una sección 'Sobre mí' que permite conocer más sobre su historia y pasión por la fotografía, además de un formulario de contacto para potenciales clientes. El diseño minimalista y elegante permite que el contenido visual sea el protagonista, creando una experiencia inmersiva para los visitantes.
portfolio.responsibilities: Como desarrollador, fui responsable de la implementación de componentes y seguir el diseño realizado en figma. Me enfoqué en crear una experiencia de usuario fluida y atractiva, desarrollando elementos personalizados como la galería de imágenes tipo polaroid, la sección de experiencia y el coso t la cosa. Aseguré que el diseño fuera completamente responsivo para garantizar una experiencia óptima en todos los dispositivos.

404.title: 404 ERROR
404.subTitle: Oops! Looks likes you’ve got lost...
404.paragraf: The page you’re looking for dosen’t exist or has been moved.

metadescription.home: En CodeLens creamos soluciones digitales a medida. Desarrollo web, diseño web, SEO y aplicaciones web para potenciar tu negocio en el mundo digital.
metadescription.404: Parece que te has perdido en el camino. La página que buscas no existe o ha sido movida. ¡Vuelve a la página de inicio y sigue explorando!
